name: Miniscule Hangar
desc:
This ship has an absolutely tiny hangar bay, limiting what fighters it can fit within.

Increases the ordnance point cost of bombers by %s, and of all other fighters by %s.

name: Cramped Missile Racks
desc: Fitting a large missile system onto this tiny ship has reduced the max ammunition by %s.

name: Vent Shields
desc: The ship's Combat Vents limit the shields to a small frontal arc. However, removing the shield is still possible, for the brave.

name: Armored Prow
desc:
The front half of this ship is mostly comprised of an ablative armor module, which has %s hull and %s armor (%s armor on XIV hulls). 
The armor module has an automatic damper field system for increased durability.

%s.
